name: Teeth and Ambitions
author: Jake Parker

additional_info.title: FAQ 2
additional_info.body:
Q: When playing Teeth and Ambitions if I choose a copy of Cinderella- Singing Sword, which has Resist 2, as my character to deal 2 damage to, can I still deal 2 damage to an opposing character as well?

A: Yes, you can. Even in this example you can still deal 2 damage to an opposing character.

flavor_text: Of course, quid pro quo, you're expected To take certain duties on board
rules_text: (A character with cost 2 or more can to sing this song for free.) Deal 2 damage to chosen character of yours to deal 2 damage to another chosen character.
